title: Healing Spirit Animal Wellness Center
cleaned_text: integrative small animal practice dedicated to providing high-quality care in a supportive, nurturing environment. Integrative medicine combines conventional medical diagnostics and treatment with alternative and complementary forms of therapy, allowing us to care for our patients in a variety of ways. Treatment Options We offer a broad spectrum of therapeutic modalities ranging from nutritional supplements, acupuncture, and herbs, to surgery, conventional pharmaceuticals and chemotherapy. We also utilize high power laser therapy, pulsed electromagnetic therapy, hydrotherapy with an underwater treadmill, and stem cell therapy. Individualized Care We recognize that our patients are as diverse as their caregivers! Our goal is to meet their needs and yours, by understanding their background and home environment, honoring your lifestyle and treatment preferences. We view medical care as a team effort and value your input. We are dedicated to delivering individualized care to best meet the needs of each patient in a calm, tranquil environment. Hours of Operation Mon-Sat: 8:00 am - 6:00 pm Have a question? Call or e-mail us.
